mi::shader_v3::Access_map_iterator

mi::shader_v3::Access_map_iterator Class Reference

Smart pointer to an access-only map iterator. It defines a dereference operator which provides access to the const methods of the wrapped Map_iterator_base object. More...

#include <shader_map.h>

Detailed Description

Smart pointer to an access-only map iterator. It defines a dereference operator which provides access to the const methods of the wrapped Map_iterator_base object.
